org.apache.giraph.utils

类 LoggerUtils

extends Object
    Logger utils for log4j

      Helper method to set the status and log message together if condition has been been met.

    • 方法详细资料

      • conditionalSetStatusAndLog

        public static void conditionalSetStatusAndLog(boolean condition,
                              org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.TaskAttemptContext context,
                              org.apache.log4j.Logger logger,
                              org.apache.log4j.Level level,
                              String message)
        Helper method to set the status and log message together if condition has been been met.
        参数:
        condition - Must be true to write status and log
        context - Context to set the status with
        logger - Logger to write to
        level - Level of logging
        message - Message to set status with

      • setStatusAndLog

        public static void setStatusAndLog(org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.TaskAttemptContext context,
                   org.apache.log4j.Logger logger,
                   org.apache.log4j.Level level,
                   String message)
        Helper method to set the status and log message together.
        参数:
        context - Context to set the status with
        logger - Logger to write to
        level - Level of logging
        message - Message to set status with
